Scheduled.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertName == "Atypical travel"
| extend User_Account_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["User Account"]),Previous_IP_Address_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Previous IP Address"]),Previous_Location_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Previous Location"]),Previous_Signin_DateTime_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Previous Signin DateTime"]),Current_IP_Address_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Current IP Address"]),Current_Location_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Current Location"]),User_Agent_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["User Agent"]),Request_Id_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Request Id"]),Device_Information_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Device Information"])
